entry.title: CTV + CSFS: a letter
entry.summary:
In a recent correspondence within the Bitcoin Development Mailing List, Andrew Poelstra, Director of Blockstream Research, shared insights into a letter addressed to Core developers. The essence of this communication centered around urging Core to expedite their review and integration processes. This acceleration, as emphasized in the letter, aims at facilitating activation planning more effectively. Initially, there were drafts that explicitly requested integration and activation. However, these demands were moderated to a more respectful tone focusing on prioritization and planning before Poelstra agreed to endorse the letter.
Despite the adjustments made to soften its demands, the letter appears to maintain a wide scope for interpretation among its signatories, hinting at varying expectations and understandings of its content and objectives. This aspect underscores the complexity and delicacy in framing requests within the developer community, especially concerning significant projects like those handled by Core.
For further details about Andrew Poelstra and his work, one can visit his professional page at [Blockstream Research](https://www.wpsoftware.net/andrew). This correspondence sheds light on the nuanced discourse prevalent in development circles, particularly in how strategic decisions and requests are communicated among peers.
